response.overview: Aakhet is an upcoming Hindi movie. The movie is directed by Ravi Buley and will feature Tanima Bhattacharya, Ashutosh Pathak, Narottam Bain and Rajnikant Singh as lead characters. Cast & Crew. Ravi BuleyDirector. Babu Nepal Singh of laadi village is a clannish, wealthy and a married person of the age about 40-42 years. He spends his holidays alone away from his urban life style every year, without fail.
response.title: Aakhet
